description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Appointment_SpecialtyObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Appointment_SpecialtyObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Appointment_SpecialtyObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Unique Reference to the Appointment Specialty. Used to identify the Appointment Specialty to update. Leave blank on an Add.

Appointment_Specialty_Data.description: Unique Identifier for the appointment specialty. If not entered, one will be generated.

SpecialtyObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

SpecialtyObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

SpecialtyObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

validation.validation: The combination of Academic Unit/Hierarchy and Specialty supplied already exists.

Academic_Appointment_SetObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Appointment_Specialty_Data.description: Academic Unit or Academic Unit Hierarchy Reference

validation.validation: You can't delete an Appointment Specialty that is assigned to an appointment.
You must enter an Academic Unit or Academic Unit Hierarchy to add a specialty.

Appointment_Specialty_Data.description: A boolean flag to disable this appointment specialty from being assigned to any appointment
